org.nd4j.linalg.fft

Class DefaultFFTInstance

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.fft.BaseFFTInstance
      • org.nd4j.linalg.fft.DefaultFFTInstance
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    FFTInstance

    public class DefaultFFTInstance
extends BaseFFTInstance
    Default FFT instance that will work that is backend agnostic.

      • fft

        public IComplexNDArray fft(IComplexNDArray inputC,
                           int numElements,
                           int dimension)
        1d discrete fourier op, note that this will throw an exception if the passed in input isn't a vector. See matlab's fft2 for more information
        Parameters:
        inputC - the input to op
        Returns:
        the the discrete fourier op of the passed in input

        dimension - the dimension to do fft along
